ygData.subject: RE: Observations: Upper & Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I will take a look at this tonight.  That is _not_ what I recall.  I thought (going from memory) that Guardian did like double the magic resist of
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I will take a look at this tonight. That is _not_ what I recall. I
thought (going from memory) that Guardian did like double the magic resist
of elemental and that the ideal way would be to stack them - one to boost mr
and the other to boost cold/fire.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 1:38 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Observations: Upper & Lower
Guk

From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 28 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> The only real threat were those froggie wizzards who would
come in a bit
> after the first pulled mob and sit at the edge of the room
and play Burn the

Guardian Rhythms should only be used as a supplement to
Elemental Rhythms. They both provide the same magic resist,
and Elemental provides fire and cold resist as well (most if
not all wizard spells are magic/fire/cold).
